title: Drawing, "Ceiling with Jupiter, Jun", 1718–30
medium:
Pen and brown ink, watercolor, over graphite
Support: heavy white laid paper
markings: Marks: fleur-de-lis in circle, similar to Heawood 1591
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink at lower right: del Albano Romo N.: on verso in another hand: No. LL
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ceiling with Jupiter, Jun", 1718–30.
1718–30. Pen and brown ink, watercolor, over graphite
Support: heavy white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-8323.
